title: The Unseen enemy
creator_credit: Damian Brown, Don Anderson and Tasmanian Film Corporation
brief_description: Safe, basic food handling methods are necessary to prevent contamination by bacteria. This film shows how unhygienic handling of cooked meats results in food poisoning.
creator_credit_for_label: Damian Brown, Don Anderson and Tasmanian Film Corporation
